{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg1252\cocoartf949\cocoasubrtf460 {\fonttbl\f0\fnil\fcharset0 LucidaGrande;} {\colortbl;\red255\green255\blue255;} \pard\tx560\tx1120\tx1680\tx2240\tx2800\tx3360\tx3920\tx4480\tx5040\tx5600\tx6160\tx6720\ql\qnatural\pardirnatural
\f0\fs26 \cf0 This is the installation program for the Timber Compiler version 1.0.3 for Intel. \ \ By default the compiler will be installed as timberc in /usr/local/bin. \ \ By default, the examples are in /usr/local/share/timberc-1.0.3/examples/.\ \ See http://www.timber-lang.org/ for more details on how to use the compiler.}

requirement.message: This software will only work on Intel-type processors.
